info:identity.info:name: com.ibm.streamsx.adaptiveparser.leef
info:identity.info:description:
Support for [https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSKMKU/com.ibm.dsm.doc/c_LEEF_Format_Guide_intro.html|Log Event Extended Format (LEEF)] library.
The Log Event Extended Format is a customized event format for IBM Security QRadar.
This toolkit provides LEEFParser composite with a ready to use pre-configured AdaptiveParser operator, parameterized for LEEF format parsing.
